name: Hkhan15.GitHub.io/html.index
body:
### What is [Assassin's Creed](http://assassinscreed.ubi.com/en-us/home/).
Assassin's Creed is a 2007 action-adventure stealth video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the first major installment in the Assassin's Creed series.
![Assassin's Creed Game](/i.ytimg.com/vi/wrH4jf_miGs/maxresdefault.jpg)

### Assassin's Creed Movie (December 21, 2016)
Through a revolutionary technology that unlocks his genetic memories, Callum Lynch (Michael Fassbender) experiences the adventures of his ancestor, Aguilar, in 15th-century Spain. Callum discovers he is a descendant from a mysterious secret society, the Assassins, and amasses incredible knowledge and skills to take on the oppressive and powerful Templar organization in the present day.
![Assassin's Creed](/7-themes.com/data_images/out/61/6979923-assassins-creed-game.jpg)

### Characters
* [Jacob Frye](http://assassinscreed.ubi.com/en-US/games/assassins-creed-syndicate/jacob-frye.aspx) "I've changed since the years of lessons from my father and my sister Evie pushing me constantly to improve. Now, I’m strong enough to run free and wild through the streets of London. And run wild, I will."
* [Evie Frye](http://assassinscreed.ubi.com/en-US/games/assassins-creed-syndicate/evie-frye.aspx) "My father taught me every intricate detail of the Assassin heritage. While my brother was off wasting time in the streets, I honed my skills. If we’re to take this city, it will be by my blade."
* [Alexander Graham Bell](http://assassinscreed.ubi.com/en-US/games/assassins-creed-syndicate/historical-characters.aspx)"Rumor has it this young Scotsman’s been working on a device that would transmit sound through the air. A useful technology, to be sure — the first to lay their hands on it will be rich indeed."

### For More Info Visit
[Assassin's Creed](http://assassinscreed.ubi.com/en-US/games/assassins-creed-syndicate/historical-characters.aspx)
